resources.string: This tab automatically presents the image of today.
Randomly selects a NASA Image of the Day, from 1995 to Today. Press the button to start or pause the loop. Pausing during a loop will cause the loop to finish before pausing.
Please Choose a date before trying to save an image.
This tab lists all the images you have saved. Press and hold an image to delete it.
"This app was made by James Ching, for the Mobile GUI Development course, in 2022. "
Select a date to see what image NASA posted on that day!
I love feedback. Send me a message!
